com.poesys.accounting.dataloader

Class DataLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.poesys.accounting.dataloader.DataLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDirector

    public class DataLoader
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDirector
    The main driver class for the Poesys Data Loader, which loads the old Poesys accounting data into the new database.
    Author:
    Robert J. Muller

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main entry point for Poesys Data Loader; exits with 0 status code if successful, 1 if not (check the log for exception stack traces)
        Parameters:
        args - the command line arguments

      • construct

        public void construct(IParameters parameters,
                      IBuilder builder,
                      IStorageManager storageManager,
                      IDataAccessService dbService)
        Description copied from interface: IDirector
        Construct the accounting system. This method parameterizes several interfaces that provide the basic services used in system construction to enable unit testing with specialized implementations of the interfaces.
        Specified by:
        construct in interface IDirector
        Parameters:
        parameters - the object containing the program parameters
        builder - the IBuilder implementation that builds the system
        storageManager - the IStorageManager implementation that stores the in-memory system
        dbService - the IDataAccessService implementation that actually stores the data in the repository

      • buildFiscalYears

        private void buildFiscalYears(IBuilder builder,
                              IParameters parameters)
        Iterate through the fiscal years from start to end, building each year.
        Parameters:
        builder - the IBuilder instance to use to build the fiscal years
        parameters - the IParameters object containing program parameters

      • validateRange

        private void validateRange(java.lang.Integer start,
                           java.lang.Integer end)
        Validate start and end years as a range of years; both years must be not null and the start year cannot be greater than the end year.
        Parameters:
        start - the start year
        end - the end year

      • writeStatements

        private void writeStatements(IParameters parameters,
                             FiscalYear fiscalYear)
        Generate a balance sheet and income statement for a fiscal year and write those statements out with the appropriate writers from the program parameters. Inform the user of the balance status of the statements.
        Parameters:
        parameters - the program parameters
        fiscalYear - the fiscal year for which to generate statements

      • writeStatementData

        private void writeStatementData(IParameters parameters,
                                FiscalYear fiscalYear,
                                Statement balanceSheet,
                                Statement incomeStatement)
        Write out the files containing statements and statement data for a fiscal year.
        Parameters:
        parameters - the parameters object giving writer access
        fiscalYear - the fiscal year to write
        balanceSheet - the balance sheet to write
        incomeStatement - the income statement to write
